choices.text:
### System:
You are an AI assistant that follows instruction extremely well. Help as much as you can.

### User:
Put together a healthy meal plan for me for seven days.  My restrictions are dairy, milk-based yogurt, garlic, honey, almonds, almond butter, pistachios, and cashews

### Response:


Sure! Here's a sample meal plan for you for the next seven days:

Day 1:
Breakfast: Greek yogurt with berries and granola
Lunch: Quinoa salad with roasted vegetables, avocado, and lemon vinaigrette
Dinner: Lentil soup with kale and a side of brown rice

Day 2:
Breakfast: Oatmeal with almond milk, mixed berries, and nuts
Lunch: Chickpea wrap with hummus, avocado, and cucumber slices
Dinner: Grilled chicken breast with roasted sweet potatoes and green beans

Day 3:
Breakfast: Smoothie bowl with spinach, banana, almond milk, chia seeds, and granola
Lunch: Tuna salad with mixed greens, cherry tomatoes, and cucumber slices
Dinner: Baked salmon with roasted asparagus and quinoa

Day 4:
Breakfast: Scrambled eggs with spinach and whole wheat toast
Lunch: Black bean soup with a side of tortilla chips
Dinner: Beef stir-fry with mixed vegetables, brown rice, and soba noodles

Day 5:
Breakfast: Greek yogurt with sliced bananas and granola
Lunch: Grilled vegetable and hummus wrap with cucumber slices
Dinner: Vegetable curry with quinoa and a side of steamed broccoli

Day 6:
Breakfast: Oatmeal with almond milk, mixed berries, and nuts
Lunch: Chickpea salad with roasted vegetables, avocado, and lemon vinaigrette
Dinner: Grilled chicken breast with roasted sweet potatoes and green beans

Day 7:
Breakfast: Smoothie bowl with spinach, banana, almond milk, chia seeds, and granola
Lunch: Tuna salad with mixed greens, cherry tomatoes, and cucumber slices
Dinner: Baked salmon with roasted asparagus and quinoa

I hope this helps! Let me know if you need any further assistance.
